Package c195Project.controller

Class MainMenuController

java.lang.Object
c195Project.controller.MainMenuController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class MainMenuController extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
THE LAMBDAS FOR THIS PROJECT CAN BE FOUND IN MAIN MENU CONTROLLER - #1 IS FOR THE MONTH TOTAL APPOINTMENTS AND #2 IS FOR THE WEEK TOTAL APPOINTMENTS
